scenario_text.value: You too? So I’m not the only one.
(Aoi’s not here... What should I do?)

Be careful, Minoru. That thing that grabbed
Aoi might be lurking around here.

I got it, I got it. If anyone shows up, me
and Falcomon’ll take them out!

(I appreciate his determination, but I hope
he doesn’t do anything risky...)

I feel it, too... This place is dangerous.
Let’s get out of here.
Hold on, let’s see what happens first.

It’ll be fine. Falcomon’s with me, and if
things get bad we can always just run away.
Rightly so. Leave this to Minoru.

Fair enough. Just don’t do anything too
risky, okay?

I’m gonna look around here a little more. Why
don’t you cover another spot?
